tool_description: Discover real-time football insights with the 'Live Football Soccer Infos' API. Stay connected to the latest live scores, team standings, and comprehensive statistics, offering a dynamic snapshot of ongoing football action. Whether you're a dedicated football enthusiast, fantasy league player, or sports analyst, our API provides accurate and up-to-date information, ensuring you never miss a beat. Elevate your football experience with 'Live Football Soccer Infos' and explore the excitement of ...
name: Live Foot Ball Soccer Infos
title: Live Foot Ball Soccer Infos

api_list.name: 5 - Get Live Soccer
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://live-foot-ball-soccer-infos.p.rapidapi.com/live/soccer/1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "live-foot-ball-soccer-infos.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
